## Examples of Valid Prophecies:
- "Level 15 will be reached by January 31, 2026"
- "The repo will have 50 stars by February 2026"
- "Player X will reach 200 karma before Player Y"
- "The 100th PR will be merged by [date]"

## Rules:
1. Prophecy must be verifiable
2. One prophecy per issue
3. Cannot predict your own actions
4. Timeframe must be within 90 days
5. If correct: +25-75 karma based on confidence
6. If wrong with "Certain": -5 karma
